title: 5 tips for writing amazingly jargon-free product copy
excerpt: These five tactics will help simplify and clarify your technical copy.

title: Product Descriptions: 17 Fresh Writing Angles
excerpt: Need to spice up descriptions for bland products? Use these themes and examples the next time you’re describing a back-to-school backpack or plain white t-shirt. You’ll soon understand how to look at ordinary products differently.

title: 3 Keys for High-converting Product Descriptions
excerpt: Writing product descriptions sounds simple. But it takes planning. The best descriptions address a broad audience, which is why many companies employ marketers to help. When writing descriptions for the masses, focus on the following three elements.
